positioning.headline: Meet Your 24/7 Parenting Coach
positioning.subheadline: Unlock Dr. Becky's expert guidance to help you solve current challenges, and get ahead of future ones, in just 5 minutes a day.
positioning.target_audience: Parents of children ages 0-18, particularly those seeking structured parenting strategies and support for challenging behavioral issues
key_value_props: Understand your child and respond effectively
Remain calm during difficult parenting moments
Gain confidence that you're on the right track
Expert guidance in just 5 minutes daily

page_structure.hero_section: Large headline with Dr. Becky's promise of expert guidance in 5 minutes daily, supported by prominent CTA buttons

positioning_themes.authority: Dr. Becky Kennedy's credentials and publications establish clinical expertise
positioning_themes.accessibility: Emphasizes brevity (5 minutes daily) to fit busy parent schedules
positioning_themes.comprehensiveness: Covers all major parenting challenges (tantrums, anxiety, backtalk, etc.)
positioning_themes.philosophy: Sturdy Parenting framework provides unique positioning language
positioning_themes.risk_reduction: Multiple money-back guarantees reduce purchase friction

content_hierarchy.above_fold: Dr. Becky's credentials, 24/7 coach promise, 5-minute claim, GET STARTED CTA
content_hierarchy.below_fold: App features, community, library, quiz section, testimonials

differentiators_on_page: "Sturdy parenting" is unique terminology not mentioned in competitor analysis
Heavy emphasis on Dr. Becky as personal authority figure
Time efficiency angle: '5 minutes a day' appeals to busy parents
Resilience focus: Building resilient kids with boundary-setting
Scripts and strategies: Practical implementation angle
Parenting patterns quiz: Interactive engagement mechanism
insights: Homepage focuses on brand and founder authority rather than specific keywords; most high-volume keywords rank on internal pages (blog, workshops) not homepage
Strong personal branding strategy: Dr. Becky Kennedy is the primary positioning mechanism, not the product feature
Behavioral problems are anchors (tantrums, backtalk, anxiety) but homepage leads with coach positioning rather than problem-solving
Money-back guarantees are prominent trust signals addressing purchase anxiety for a parenting app
The 5-minute claim is a key differentiator for time-constrained parents; homepage emphasizes access over depth
Homepage keywords are mostly branded terms (good inside, dr becky) - long-tail behavioral keywords are captured by internal pages, suggesting intentional content distribution strategy
Sturdy parenting philosophy provides unique vocabulary that differentiates from generic parenting advice market
App features are positioned as personalized support + chatbot + reminders, keeping functionality minimal above the fold
